title: Uknown Font
content:
Hello, I'm trying to identify the font used in the attached image--the font on the t-shirt that reads "Gegard" etc., please. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701135324im_/http:/typophile.com/files/munoz%20t-shirt_6079.jpg)
author: voxxamp

comments.content:
Available under many names but I don't know if any of them is the original.  
Try to search for one of the following:  
Varsity Block, NFL Varsity Block, Varsity Classic, NFL Titans, NFL Ravens
